## TileResourceInfo interface

Simple information about resource usage by the \[\[Tile\]\]. Heap and GPU information are estimations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TileResourceInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [gpuSize](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.gpusize.md) | number | Estimated number of bytes used on the GPU. |
|  [heapSize](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.heapsize.md) | number | Estimated number of bytes used on the heap. |
|  [num3dObjects](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.num3dobjects.md) | number | Number of \[\[THREE.Object3D\]\] in this tile. |
|  [numTextElements](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.numtextelements.md) | number | Number of \[\[TextElement\]\]s in this tile. |
|  [numUserTextElements](./harp-mapview.tileresourceinfo.numusertextelements.md) | number |  |
